Text: i was wondering........... what is this before i download it? is it anderson silva fights or what?

@Bokey Boy your mouse has at least two buttons, right? Press and hold the left one as you select the title of the torrent or any text you see on the web, then click the selected text with the right button and select "Search Google for ... (selected text)". If these mouse-wielding techniques are too difficult, you can just type in the text for search in any Web browser (a browser is Google or Yahoo or any other similar site) using the buttons on your keyboard that are marked with letters. Good luck!
